timeline.message: fix(TBD-9791): update dom4j lib for tPigLoad

timeline.bodyText: I don't see old version of this lib in talend-update or mvn repository. Could you please confirm it was missing?
timeline.author: amedvedenko
timeline.diffHunk:

 				REQUIRED="false" REQUIRED_IF="LOCAL=='true'" />

replies.bodyText: I guess it is missing. Don't see it either.
replies.author: sponomarova

timeline.bodyText: New version doesn't exist nor in talend-update or in mvnrepsoitory. This version exists with different groupId: org.dom4j, link with missing: https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/dom4j/dom4j; link to correct: https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.dom4j/dom4j
